 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָתַל‎</span>] **verb** — only **Pi\`el** ==deceive, mock==, ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיְהַתֵּל בָּהֶם‎</span> [[1Kgs.18.27|1Kgs 18:27]] (secondary formation from <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תלל‎</span> Hiph\`il, q. v.; compare [[BDB#Thes|Thes]] [[BDB#Ol|Ol]]<sup>§ 257 f.</sup> near the end [[BDB#Sta|Sta]]<sup>§ 145 e</sup>; otherwise [[BDB#Kö|Kö]]<sup>i. 352</sup>; see further below <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תלל‎</span>). 

<small>Also see: **<big>[[H8524|תָּלַל]]</big>** | **<big>[[H2049|הָתֹל]]</big>**</small>

 II. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תָּלַל‎</span>] **verb Hiph\`il** ==mock, deceive, trifle with== (perhaps akin to Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***act coquettishly***; compare secondary √ [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָתַל‎</span>]); — ***mock trifle with***, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span> person: ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֵ֫תֶל (בִּיׅ‎</span> [[Gen.31.7|Gen 31:7]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֵתַ֫לְתָּ‎</span> [[Judg.16.10|Judg 16:10]]; [[Judg.16.13|Judg 16:13]]; [[Judg.16.15|Judg 16:15]] ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְהָתֵ֫לּוּ‎</span> [[Jer.9.4|Jer 9:4]], 2 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּהָתֵ֫לּוּ‎</span> [[Job.13.9|Job 13:9]] (on both see [[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:53q»§ 53q</sup> [[BDB#Baer|Baer]]<sup>on the passage</sup>); ***Infinitive construct*** [[Job.13.19|Job 13:19]] and (absolute) [[Exod.8.25|Exod 8:25]] ([[BDB#J|J]]). **Hoph\`al** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הוּתַל‎</span> [[Isa.44.20|Isa 44:20]] a heart (which) ***is deceived***. — See [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָתַל‎</span>], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֲתֻלִים‎</span> p. 251.
